me.shoutto.sdk

Class StmService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • me.shoutto.sdk.StmService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, LocationUpdateListener

    public class StmService
extends android.app.Service
implements LocationUpdateListener
    The main entry point to interact with the Shout to Me platform. StmService is implemented as an Android service and can therefore be bound or started in accordance with standard Android usage.

    See Also:
    Android Services

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StmService.StmBinder
      The class to be used when binding via the Android bound service method.

      • addTopicPreference

        public void addTopicPreference(java.lang.String topic,
                               StmCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Adds a topic preference to the user's record. This will result in a user only receiving notifications for the specified topics.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic
        callback - An optional callback or null

        Parameters:
        createShoutRequest - A CreateShoutRequest object with all required fields
        callback - An optional callback or null

      • getMessages

        public void getMessages(StmCallback<java.util.List<Message>> callback)
        Calls the service to get the list of user's messages and returns the list in the callback. Currently only returns 1000 records.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to execute or null.

      • getUserAuthToken

        public java.lang.String getUserAuthToken()
        Returns the user auth token from local storage or gets it from the service if not in local storage. This token can be used to make calls to the Shout to Me REST API outside of the SDK.
        Returns:
        The user auth token.

      • handleHandWaveGesture

        public void handleHandWaveGesture()
        Calls registered listeners when a hand wave gesture occurs.

                                  StmCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Sends request to the Shout to Me service to see if the user is subscribed to the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The channel ID to check subscription status.
        callback - The callback to be executed or null.

        onUnbind in class android.app.Service
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent that was used to bind to this service.
        Returns:
        Return true if you would like to have the service's onRebind(Intent) method later called when new clients bind to it.

      • reloadUser

        public void reloadUser(StmCallback<User> callback)
        Reinitializes the user by making a call to the service. Overrides previous values stored in Shared Preferences following the call to the service.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback to be executed or null

      • removeTopicPreference

        public void removeTopicPreference(java.lang.String topic,
                                  StmCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Removes a topic preference from the user's record. If additional topics are still in the user's record, they will no longer receive shouts with the specified topic. If removing the last topic preference and the user has no more topic preferences, then the user will receive shouts from all topics.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to remove
        callback - An optional callback or null

      • setChannelId

        public void setChannelId(java.lang.String channelId)
        Sets the Shout to Me channel ID in local storage.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The Shout to Me channel ID.

      • setServerUrl

        public void setServerUrl(java.lang.String serverUrl)
        Sets the Shout to Me API URL. This method is not normally used for production releases. It can be used to point to testing environments. Contact Shout to Me for more information.
        Parameters:
        serverUrl - The Shout to Me API server URL to use for HTTP calls.

      • setShoutCreationCallback

        public void setShoutCreationCallback(StmCallback<Shout> shoutCreationCallback)
        Sets the callback to be executed following the creation of a shout.
        Parameters:
        shoutCreationCallback - The callback to be executed following the creation of a shout or null.

      • subscribeToChannel

        callback - The callback to be executed or null.
